# internet

Internet tools

# search_internet { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.internet.search_internet }

`tools.internet.search_internet(query='what is the Ibis project?', n_results=8)`

Searches the internet for the given query.

# webpage_to_str { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.internet.webpage_to_str }

`tools.internet.webpage_to_str(url='https://ibis-project.org')`

Reads a webpage link into a string. Useful for summarizing webpages.

# open_browser { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.internet.open_browser }

`tools.internet.open_browser(url)`

Opens the URL in a web browser.
